instruction: Given the set of words, come up with a poem within 80 words.
output:
The ocean so blue, feeling the bubbles so true.
I take a dip, cool and crisp, and the the ocean blue.
The sun sparkling and the waves moving so free,
The peace that I feel and the salt on my skin.
The bubbles dancing and the stars in the sky,
I wish this moment will never pass by.
